title: Gadgets for Techies
caption: Tech out with these gadgets
body: Nothing brings out the kid in techies like a new gadget.

title: Gifts for Him
body: There’s really no guy who is easy to shop for—clichéd but true. In our experience, it’s the classic, simply-designed pieces that appeal to most men. And music. And tech. And booze.

title: Last Minute Gift Ideas
caption: Gifts you need ASAP!
body: We get it, the holidays are crazy. If you need a gift NOW, we've got you covered. Take a deep breath and check out these rush gift ideas.
